meanings.definition: A woman with abnormally excessive sexual desire.
meanings.sent1: The nymphomaniac in the movie always wanted to be with different men.
meanings.sent2: She was labeled a nymphomaniac by her friends because of her constant pursuit of romantic encounters.
meanings.sent3: The nymphomaniac's love for dating made her the most popular girl in town.
meanings.sent4: Her obsession with romance turned her into a social butterfly, earning her the nickname 'nymphomaniac'.
meanings.sent5: The town gossips couldn't stop talking about the nymphomaniac's love life.

meanings.definition: A person who has an excessive or uncontrollable sexual desire.
meanings.sent1: The therapist helped the nymphomaniac understand and manage her urges.
meanings.sent2: Being a nymphomaniac can be challenging when trying to maintain healthy relationships.
meanings.sent3: The nymphomaniac's constant flirting at work often led to awkward situations.
meanings.sent4: His reputation as a nymphomaniac made him the subject of many jokes among his friends.
meanings.sent5: The novel's main character was portrayed as a nymphomaniac struggling with her desires.
